title: 1 large bedroom in custom home
posting_body: ['The apartment photos are being shown while tenant’s belongings are being packed for moving.', 'Tenant is moving at the end of August 2022.', '1 large bedroom', 'Full bathroom with shower and bathtub', 'Closets galore: double closets in bedroom, linen closet and coat closet in hallway', 'Sun drenched', 'Hardwood flooring throughout including stairs with the exception of the kitchen that has porcelain tiles', 'Baseboard heating', '2nd floor apartment (NOT a basement)', 'of custom center hall colonial in prestigious South East Annadale surrounded by other center hall colonial homes', 'One block to local and express buses', 'Own Thermostat', 'No pets', 'No smokers', 'Ideal for 1-2 persons', 'Tenant pays own electric, cooking gas and heating', 'Requirements: Proof of income(pay stubs, 2021 tax return, must make 40 x the rent), driver’s license, social security card, Full credit report 750+ scores, and credit, evictions and income  application need to be filled out.', 'If interested, Please write back about yourself so I can get to know you better.', 'Ex: your full name, phone number, Work, gross income, credit score, age, how many people would be occupying, reason for leaving your current apartment, etc. etc.', 'Only serious inquiries and responding in accordance with the requirements listed above and written disclosure about yourself as asked above.']
